protocol_name: Immunohistochemistry Protocol for Sternberger Monoclonal Antibodies
protocol_name_html: Immunohistochemistry Protocol for Sternberger Monoclonal Antibodies
guidelines:
Use with Ultra Streptavidin Detection Kit (SIG-32250) or (SIG-32248)

 

Positive control: Normal human cerebellum (except SMI-71, which should be rat brain)
